articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: EU threatens to retaliate if UK overhauls Northern Ireland Protocol - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The response from the European Commission vice-president is likely to aggravate fears new legislation could spark a trade war with the bloc.
articles.content:
The EU has threatened to retaliate with all measures at its disposal if the UK proceeds with controversial plans to rip up parts of the Northern Ireland Protocol.
The UK foreign secretary has set ou… [+7411 chars]
